snippet: Allies of Bill de Blasio spent nearly $500,000 to put the ad on the air, and they plan to spend more to keep it on through the month.
abstract: Allies of New York Mayor Bill de Blasio spend nearly $500,000 to put 30-second spot on local broadcast and cable television stations, extolling his education initiative, and plan to spend a total of more than $1 million to keep it on the air for a month; ad is show of support for a mayor keen to regain command of his political message as he approaches his 100th day in office.
lead_paragraph: Allies of Bill de Blasio spent nearly $500,000 to put the ad on the air, and they plan to spend more to keep it on through the month.

headline.main: Pre-K Victory Ad With Mayor de Blasio’s Family Aims to Help Him Regain His Footing
headline.print_headline: Pre-K Victory Ad With Mayor’s Family Aims to Help Him Regain His Footing
